ygData.subject: Re: Fortuneteller arrives
ygData.msgSnippet: At the word brother Fortuneteller began to reconsider whether or not Malice was really a potential father. OOC: Somehow I read over all of Organics stuff,

At the word "brother" Fortuneteller began to
reconsider whether or not Malice was really a
potential father.

OOC: Somehow I read over all of Organics stuff, and
STILL thought he was a different guy.  Do you have any
other suggestions for the father?

--- robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
> OOC:  I don't see why not.  When Leige Maximo bugged
> out, it was not really in use.  It still retains
> knowledge, though not as much as the Autobot one. 
> Perhaps, he can get a boost of power from Vector
> Sigma...
>  
> Organics/ Megatron Revived:
> IC:
> "Thanks, but first, Malice..." Organics said,
> turning from the sky.
>  
> "Who is this 'Malice'?  I have been here only a
> short time and every other sentance from you
> concerns this 'Malice.'  Who is he?" Megatron
> Revived asked.
> "He is our brother.  Neutronics changed his name and
> his soul, after he and I were seperated three
> hundred years ago.  In the future anyhow.  Can't you
> find him, with the Matrix?"
> The clone thought it over, then returned his answer.
> "I have not had it long enough, it has a limited
> range on whose spark I can see into.  Only nearby
> Decepticons can I sense."
> 
> Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
> Fortuneteller smiled, "Perhaps I can help you
> there."
> 
> OOC: Is there any reason the Decepticon Matrix of
> Leadership won't work on him? Also, would the
> council
> please e-mail me the restrictions on the Deviners.
> 
> --- robert riley wrote:
> > OOC: A while back I did some research on such a
> > subject and found out Cybertron is about the size
> or
> > a little larger than our moon.
> > 
> > IC:
> > "Who knows," Organics said, still looking up," he
> is
> > just as unpredictable as anything. I don't know
> how
> > we will get rid of him."
> > 
> > Kyle Stewart wrote:
> > OOC: I thought that Earth was smaller than
> > Cybertron,
> > and Unicron could eat that, albeit it took him a
> > little longer. Of course I just heard that from
> > someone else on this site, and if it's true the
> > Transformer people lack a sense of perspective.
> > 
> > BIC: "Well then why not just eat this continent?
> Or
> > this base for that matter?"
> > 
> > --- robert riley wrote:
> > > Organics:
> > > 
> > > The valkyrie walked over to the pilot.
> > > "Don't worry, he can't simply eat this world.
> He's
> > > too small!" she said with a small smile.
> > > She shifted her gaze up, and he smile faded. 
> > > "I hope they don't try to mind control him or
> > > something," she said softly," they would unleash
> > > more trouble than any of us can handle."
> > > 
> > > Kyle Stewart wrote:
> > > Fortuneteller sensed a strange destiny ripple
> with
> > > the
> > > name "Malice", he was at least a potential
> father.
> > 
> > > She would have to see if she could absorb his
> > > destiny
> > > energy along with Organics.
> > > 
> > > Then she looked up at the sky. If Unicron was
> here
> > > she couldn't imagine the true extent of his
> > destiny
> > > energy, the power to snuff our worlds. It was
> more
> > > than she'd ever be able to absorb. While her
> > orders
> > > remained to take Organics', she would see to
> > taking
> > > at
> > > least a sample of Unicrons futures as well.
> > > 
> > > --- robert riley wrote:
> > > > Organics/ Megatron Revived:
> > > > 
> > > > "What questions? We have to get Malice back as
> > > soon
> > > > as we can!" Organics snapped, but soon
> > apologized.
> > > > 
> > > > "Rodimus Prime? I do not believe I have had
> the
> > > > pleasure of meeting him. I wonde how Hot Rod
> has
> > > > been doing." Megatron Revived said with a
> grin.
> > > > 
> > > > airly2000 wrote:
> > > > YDrassil:::
> > > > 
> > > > "And ï¿½Rodimus Prime will have quiestion that
> > have
> > > to
> > > > be answered..." 
> > > > said Ydrassil
> > > >

> > > > 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > Megatron Revived/ Organics:
> > > > > 
> > > > > "How was he when he was taken? Was he
> > > > functioning? Was he 
> > > > fighting?" the clone asked in earnest.
> > > > > "Yes, he fought and nearly destroyed three
> of
> > > > them, but I was 
> > > > captured, and they took him." Organics said,
> > > walking
> > > > up to her step 
> > > > brother and esting her head on his broad
> chest.
> > > > > "Do hate for losing him?"
> > > > > The Emperor brought his right hand up and
> > > > comforted the smaller 
> > > > bot.
> > > > > "I have changed so since our last meeting.
> No,
> > I
> > > > do not. We will 
> > > > retrieve him, but we must rest, all are weary
> > > right
> > > > now."
> > > > > 
> > > > > airly2000 wrote:
> > > > > Ydrassil:
> > > > > 
> > > > > Ydrassil looked them, without say nothing
> > > > >

> > > > 
> > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > Megatron Revived/ Organics:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "I most certainly am not joking. I nearly
> > > > crashed into him when 
> > > > I 
> > > > > arrived. Besides, I have a score to settle
> > with
> > > > him. He is here 
> > > > to 
> > > > > do what he attempted years ago: destroy the
> > > > Autobot Matrix."
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Organics stepped forward as her step
> brother
> > > > brought the pilot 
> > > > > with him.
> > > > > > "And Unicron has his minions in full
> force. 
> > > > They managed to 
> > > > take 
> > > > > our brother, a most powerful bounty hunter.
> > They
> > > > took him with 
> > > > > them, up there," she said, a little sad and
> > > point
> > > > up, to Unicron.
> > > > > > "WHAT?!?" the clone roared, clinching his
> > > fists.
> > > > 
> > > > > > Organics rushed to calm the Emperor clone,
> > to
> > > > some avail.
